byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: DealBook Online; Securities and Exchange Commission chairwoman Mary Jo White says agency does not necessarily regard activist investors with disapproval.
lead_paragraph: Mary Jo White says activist tactics “can be compatible with the kind of engagement that I hope companies and shareholders can foster.”

headline.main: S.E.C. Chief Sees Virtue in Activist Investors

snippet: Mary Jo White says activist tactics “can be compatible with the kind of engagement that I hope companies and shareholders can foster.”
